dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement]
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, July 05, 2005 11:16 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; james.scott27@ntlworld.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement
Date: Sun, 3 Jul 2005 17:38:28 +0100
From: James Scott <james.scott27@ntlworld.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>

Hello,

I am writing to you because of a copyright infringement on a website that I
believe to be hosted at The Planet. I have attempted to contact the owners
of the website in question, however I haven't received a reply from them and
the issue has not been dealt with.

The website in question is hallagulla.net/pitec.net.

http://www.hallagulla.net/vb3/showthread.php?t=85625

The biographical text located on that page was taken, without permission,
from my website, tomwelling.org. Ironically the source code was copied in
its entirety, so the text has been copied complete with a copyright notice
that reads "please do not reproduce without written permission".

Of course they did exactly that.

I would appreciate the complete removal of my work from that website's
database.

Best regards,
James Scott

- --
Thanks,
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFCyrJXvK/XpJs6oyURAoS1AJ9sSskMmy/20cO0EkdXcu1FKl7g6wCcDxgj
ZAwcjodGM0crz/e6YhgrsK4=
=yh6/
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
